classes.name: BBjGridSelectCellEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 19.20 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_GRID_SELECT_CELL event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/BBjGridSelectCellEvent/BBjGridSelectCellEvent.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedCellCount
methods.docu: In BBj 19.20 and higher, this method returns the number of cells that are selected by the user if the grid is in multiple selection mode (BBjGrid::setMultipleSelection) and the Enhanced Selection Model is enabled using BBjGrid::setEnhancedSelectionModelEnabled. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/BBjGridSelectCellEvent/BBjGridSelectCellEvent_getSelectedCellCount.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedCells
methods.docu: In BBj 19.20 and higher, this method returns a BBjVector containing the selected cells in a grid. If the grid is in multiple selection mode (BBjGrid::setMultipleSelection) and the Enhanced Selection Model is enabled using BBjGrid::setEnhancedSelectionModelEnabled, then the BBjVector may contain multiple cells. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/BBjGridSelectCellEvent/BBjGridSelectCellEvent_getSelectedCells.htm)

classes.name: BBjGridEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, a number of BBjEvent Objects implement the BBjGridEvent interface. This interface provides three convenience methods that allow a program to retrieve the grid that was the source of the event and to cast it to either a BBjStandardGrid, BBjDataAwareGrid, or BBjDataBoundGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_BBjGridEvent/interface_bbjgridevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjGridEnterKeyEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_GRID_ENTER_KEY event. If getEnterAsTab() <link> returns true, then whenever user presses Enter, BBj will treat that key entry as though the user had pressed Tab and so the ENTER GridNotifyEvent will not be sent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/bbjgridenterkeyevent/bbjgridenterkeyevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjTimerEvent
classes.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, if a program created a timer by calling

BBjAPI createTimer(Object key, int seconds, string label) or   BBjAPI createTimer(Object key, int seconds, UserObject userObject, String methodsName), then, when the program is in the callback that was registered, a call to BBjAPI().getLastEvent() returns a BBjTimerEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTimerEvent/bbjtimerevent.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedIndices
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns a BBjVector containing the indices of the currently selected items in the BBjListBox, BBjListButton, BBjListEdit controls. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjListCloseEvent/bbjlistcloseevent_getselectedindices.htm)

methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns the index of the currently selected item in the BBjListBox, BBjListButton, BBjListEdit controls. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjListCloseEvent/bbjlistcloseevent_getselectedindex.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedItem
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns the text of the currently selected item in a BBjListButton or BBjListEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjListCloseEvent/bbjlistcloseevent_getselecteditem.htm)

classes.name: BBjNavigatorMovePreviousEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_NAV_PREVIOUS event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/bbjnavigatormovepreviousevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjMouseMoveEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_MOUSE_MOVE event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/bbjmousemoveevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjScriptLoadedEvent
classes.docu:
In BBj 19.20 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI (). getLastEvent () when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_SCRIPT_LOADED event. In BBj 22.03 and higher, this event is also fired by the BBjWebManager::injectScriptUrl method. When this event is fired from BBjWebManager, the getControl() method returns null().
[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjScriptLoadedEvent.htm)

methods.name: getUrl
methods.docu: In BBj 19.20 and higher, this method returns the JavaScript URL of JavaScript successfully loaded using the BBjHtmlView::injectUrl method. In BBj 22.03 and higher, this event is also fired by the BBjBuiManager::injectScriptUrl method. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjScriptLoadedEvent_getUrl.htm)

classes.name: BBjBrowserBackEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 16.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_BROWSER_BACK event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bui/BBjBrowserBackEvent.htm)

classes.name: BBjGridSelectColumnEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_GRID_SELECT_COLUMN event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/BBjGridSelectColumnEvent/bbjgridselectcolumnevent.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedColumnCount
methods.docu: This method returns the number of columns that are selected.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/BBjGridSelectColumnEvent/bbjgridselectcolumnevent_getselectedcolumncount.htm)

classes.name: BBjMouseUpEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_MOUSE_UP event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/bbjmouseupevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjGeolocationEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 11.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_GEOLOCATION_WATCH event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent.htm)

methods.name: getStatus
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns 0 for success or a non-zero error code to indicate failure.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent_getstatus.htm)

methods.name: getMessage
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method may return additional information if getStatus() indicates an error result.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent_getmessage.htm)

methods.name: getTimestamp
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the time when this position information was acquired.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent_gettimestamp.htm)

methods.name: getLatitude
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the latitude in decimal degrees.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent_getlatitude.htm)

methods.name: getLongitude
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the longitude in decimal degrees.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent_getlongitude.htm)

methods.name: getAccuracy
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the accuracy level of the latitude and longitude coordinates.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent_getaccuracy.htm)

methods.name: getAltitude
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the altitude in meters. If the altitude is unavailable, it returns null.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent_getaltitude.htm)

methods.name: getAltitudeAccuracy
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the accuracy level of the altitude value, specified in meters.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent_getaltitudeaccuracy.htm)

methods.name: getHeading
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the current heading in degrees.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent_getheading.htm)

methods.name: getSpeed
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the speed in meters per second.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjGeolocationEvent/bbjgeolocationevent_getspeed.htm)

classes.name: BBjWebEventOptions
classes.docu: A BBjWebEventOptions object is used to customize the client-side behavior of a BBjWebEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions.htm)

methods.name: setThrottle
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method throttles the client-side BBjWebComponent event handler to the specified delay in milliseconds. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_setThrottle.htm)

methods.name: setDebounce
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this setting debounces the client-side BBjWebComponent event handler to the specified delay in milliseconds. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_setDebounce.htm)

methods.name: setImmediate
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this setting clears any previously defined setDebounce or setThrottle setting, resetting the client-side BBjWebComponent event handler to the default setting of being reported to the server immediately. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_setImmediate.htm)

methods.name: addItem
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method can be invoked one or more times to specify values to return in BBjWebEvent::getEventMap. By default, BBjWebEvent doesn't return any detail values. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_addItem.htm)

methods.name: setCode
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method defines additional JavaScript code to be run in the context of the client-side BBjWebComponent event handler.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_setCode.htm)

methods.name: setFilter
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method defines JavaScript to be run in the context of the client-side BBjWebComponent event handler that evaluates to true if this event should be delivered to the application or false if the event should be dropped.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_setFilter.htm)

methods.name: getImmediate
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns true if neither BBjWebEventOptions::setDebounce nor BBjWebEventOptions::setThrottle was previously invoked. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_getImmediate.htm)

methods.name: getDebounce
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns true if BBjWebEventOptions::setDebounce was previously invoked. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_getDebounce.htm)

methods.name: getLeading
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns the value of the leading parameter specified in a previous invocation of BBjWebEventOptions::setDebounce. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_getLeading.htm)

methods.name: getTrailing
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns the value of the trailing parameter specified in a previous invocation of BBjWebEventOptions::setDebounce. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_getTrailing.htm)

methods.name: getThrottle
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns true if BBjWebEventOptions::setThrottle was previously invoked.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_getThrottle.htm)

methods.name: getDelay
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns the value of the delay parameter specified in a previous invocation of BBjWebEventOptions::setDebounce or BBjWebEventOptions::setThrottle. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_getDelay.htm)

methods.name: getItemMap
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns a collection of all items previously set using BBjWebEventOptions::addItem. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_getItemMap.htm)

methods.name: getCode
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns the value previously set using BBjWebEventOptions::setCode. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_getCode.htm)

methods.name: getFilter
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns the value previously set using BBjWebEventOptions::setFilter. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebEventOptions/BBjWebEventOptions_getFilter.htm)

classes.name: BBjTabKeypressEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_TAB_KEYPRESS event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/bbjtabkeypressevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjKeypressEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_KEYPRESS event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/bbjkeypressevent.htm)

methods.name: getKeyCode
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns the keycode for the key that was pressed.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/bbjkeypressevent_getkeycode.htm)

methods.name: getKeyChar
methods.docu: This method returns the character associated with the key that was pressed.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/bbjkeypressevent_getkeychar.htm)

methods.name: isShiftDown
methods.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns an indication of whether the <kbd>Shift</kbd> key was pressed 
 at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/bbjkeypressevent_isshiftdown.htm)

methods.name: isControlDown
methods.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns an indication of whether the <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> key was pressed 
 at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/bbjkeypressevent_iscontroldown.htm)

methods.name: isAltDown
methods.docu:
This method returns an indication of whether the <kbd>Alt</kbd> key was pressed 
 at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/bbjkeypressevent_isaltdown.htm)

methods.name: isCmdDown
methods.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns an indication of whether the Mac <kbd>Cmd</kbd> key was pressed 
 at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/bbjkeypressevent_iscmddown.htm)

methods.name: getCapsLock
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method returns 
an indication of whether the <kbd>CapsLock</kbd> key was pressed at the time this 
event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/BBjKeypressEvent_getCapsLock.htm)

methods.name: getNumLock
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.10 and higher, this method 
 returns an indication of whether the [NumLock] key was pressed at the 
 time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/BBjKeypressEvent_getNumLock.htm)

methods.name: getKeyLocation
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.10 and higher, this method returns 
 a flag that indicates the location of the 
 key on the keyboard.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/BBjKeypressEvent_getKeyLocation.htm)

methods.name: getOriginalControl
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the BBjControl that originated this window keypress event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjKeypressEvent/BBjKeypressEvent_getOriginalControl.htm)

classes.name: BBjGridListCancelEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 15.00 and higher, BBjAPI().getLastEvent() returns this event when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_GRID_LIST_CANCEL event. This event is currently only available in GUI. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/BBjGridListCancelEvent.htm)

classes.name: BBjTreeMouseDoubleClickEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_TREE_DOUBLE_CLICK event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseDoubleClickEvent/bbjtreemousedoubleclickevent.htm)

methods.name: getTree
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this method returns the BBjTree associated with the BBjTreeMouseDoubleClickEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseDoubleClickEvent/BBjTreeMouseDoubleClickEvent_getTree.htm)

classes.name: BBjGridCheckOffEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_GRID_CHECK_OFF event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/bbjgridcheckoffevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjGridCellEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, BBjGridCellEvent is an abstract class that acts as the base class for other BBj events generated by a BBjGrid [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/bbjgridcellevent/bbjgridcellevent.htm)

methods.name: getRow
methods.docu: This method returns the currently selected row at the time the event was generated. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/bbjgridcellevent/bbjgridcellevent_getrow.htm)

methods.name: getColumn
methods.docu: This method returns the currently selected column at the time the event was generated. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/bbjgridcellevent/bbjgridcellevent_getcolumn.htm)

methods.name: getCellBounds
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns the bounds of the cell on which the event occurred.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/bbjgridcellevent/bbjgridcellevent_getcellbounds.htm)

methods.name: getOriginalText
methods.docu: This method returns the original text of the cell at the time the event was generated. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/bbjgridcellevent/bbjgridcellevent_getoriginaltext.htm)

classes.name: BBjPageLoadedEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_PAGE_LOADED event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjPageLoadedEvent/bbjpageloadedevent.htm)

methods.name: getUrl
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns the URL of a page successfully loaded to a BBjHtmlView or BBjHtmlEdit control using the setUrl method, or by the user interactively navigating to a page by clicking on a link. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjPageLoadedEvent/BBjPageLoadedEvent_getUrl.htm)

methods.name: getText
methods.docu: In BBj 21.10 and higher, this method returns the HTML content of a page successfully loaded to a BBjHtmlView or BBjHtmlEdit control with the setText or setUrl method, or by the user interactively navigating to a page by clicking on a link. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjPageLoadedEvent/BBjPageLoadedEvent_getText.htm)

classes.name: BBjColorChooserCancelEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_COLORCHOOSER_CANCEL event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/bbjcolorchoosercancelevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjTreeMouseEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, BBjTreeMouseEvent is an abstract class that acts as the base class for other events. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseEvent/bbjtreemouseevent.htm)

methods.name: getExactNodeID
methods.docu: In BBj 9.0 and higher, this method returns the node ID of the node on which this event occurred, or -1 if the user didn't click exactly on a node.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseEvent/BBjTreeMouseEvent_getExactNodeID.htm)

methods.name: getMouseButton
methods.docu: This method returns an ID indicating which mouse button was pressed.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseEvent/BBjTreeMouseEvent_getMouseButton.htm)

methods.name: getX
methods.docu: This method returns the X coordinate of the point.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseEvent/bbjtreemouseevent_getx.htm)

methods.name: getY
methods.docu: This method returns the Y coordinate of the point.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseEvent/bbjtreemouseevent_gety.htm)

methods.name: isAltDown
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns indication of whether the <kbd>Alt</kbd> key was pressed at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseEvent/bbjtreemouseevent_isaltdown.htm)

methods.name: isCmdDown
methods.docu:
In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns indication of whether the 
 macOS <kbd>Cmd</kbd> key 
 was pressed at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseEvent/bbjtreemouseevent_iscmddown.htm)

methods.name: isControlDown
methods.docu: This method returns indication of whether the <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> key was pressed at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseEvent/bbjtreemouseevent_iscontroldown.htm)

methods.name: isShiftDown
methods.docu: This method returns indication of whether the <kbd>Shift</kbd> key was pressed at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseEvent/bbjtreemouseevent_isshiftdown.htm)

classes.name: BBjWindowScrollEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_WINDOW_SCROLL event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjWindowScrollEvent/bbjwindowscrollevent.htm)

methods.name: getScrollOrientation
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the scroll orientation (HORIZONTAL 
 or VERTICAL).[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjWindowScrollEvent/BBjWindowScrollEvent_getScrollOrientation.htm)

methods.name: getScrollValue
methods.docu: This method returns the new scroll location.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjWindowScrollEvent/bbjwindowscrollevent_getscrollvalue.htm)

methods.name: getHorizontalScrollValue
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the horizontal scroll value. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjWindowScrollEvent/BBjWindowScrollEvent_getHorizontalScrollValue.htm)

methods.name: isAdjusting
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns a boolean that indicates 
 whether the user is actively dragging the scrollbar.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjWindowScrollEvent/BBjWindowScrollEvent_isAdjusting.htm)

classes.name: BBjListSelectEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_LIST_SELECT event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjListSelectEvent/bbjlistselectevent.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedIndices
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns a BBjVector containing the indices of the currently selected items in the BBjListBox, BBjListButton, BBjListEdit controls. First, the user has executed the restore command and has provided a restore string that is invalid for the control's output mask. Second, the SENDMSG() function was issued to set the restore string, but the string was not valid for the control's output mask. In BBj 6.00 and higher, if a program registered a callback for a BBjNamespace variable by calling one of these methods:

BBjNamespace::setCallbackForVariable()
BBjNamespace::setCallbackForVariableChange()
BBjNamespace::setCallbackForNamespace()
BBjNamespace::setCallbackForNamespaceChange() then, when the program is in the callback that was registered, a call to BBjAPI.getLastEvent() returns a BBjNamespaceEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjNameSpaceEvent/bbjnamespaceevent.htm)

methods.docu: In BBj 23 and higher, this method returns the number of mouse clicks associated with this event.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjMouseEvent/BBjMouseEvent_getClickCount.htm)

methods.name: isControlDown
methods.docu: This method returns an indication of whether the <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> key was pressed at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjMouseEvent/bbjmouseevent_iscontroldown.htm)

methods.name: isShiftDown
methods.docu: This method returns an indication of whether the <kbd>Shift</kbd> key was pressed at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjMouseEvent/bbjmouseevent_isshiftdown.htm)

methods.name: isAltDown
methods.docu: This method returns an indication of whether the <kbd>Alt</kbd> key was pressed at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjMouseEvent/bbjmouseevent_isaltdown.htm)

methods.name: isCmdDown
methods.docu:
This method returns an indication of whether the Mac 
OS X <kbd>Cmd</kbd> (Meta) 
 key was pressed at the time this event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjMouseEvent/BBjMouseEvent_isCmdDown.htm)

methods.name: getMouseButton
methods.docu:
In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns an ID indicating which mouse 
 button was pressed.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjMouseEvent/bbjmouseevent_getmousebutton.htm)

methods.name: getLegacyMouseButton
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns an ID indicating which mouse 
 button was pressed.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjMouseEvent/BBjMouseEvent_getLegacyMouseButton.htm)

methods.name: getNativeMouseButton
methods.docu: In BBj 21.0 and higher, this method returns the ID of the mouse button as defined by the underlying client GUI platform (GUI = Java Swing; BUI = JavaScript). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjMouseEvent/BBjMouseEvent_getNativeMouseButton.htm)

methods.name: getOriginalControl
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the BBjControl that originated this mouse event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjMouseEvent/BBjMouseEvent_getOriginalControl.htm)

classes.name: BBjTreeRightMouseDownEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_TREE_RIGHT_MOUSE_DOWN event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeRightMouseDownEvent/bbjtreerightmousedownevent.htm)

methods.name: getTree
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this method returns the BBjTree associated with the BBjTreeRightMouseDownEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeRightMouseDownEvent/BBjTreeRightMouseDownEvent_getTree.htm)

classes.name: BBjMinimizeEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_MINIMIZE event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/bbjminimizeevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjGridColumnSelectionChangedEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 19.20 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_COLUMN_SELECTION_CHANGE event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/BBjGridColumnSelectionChangedEvent/BBjGridColumnSelectionChangedEvent.htm)

classes.name: BBjSysGuiEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, BBjSysGuiEvent is an abstract class that acts as the base class for all events generated by user interaction with BBjSysGui. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjSysGuiEvent/bbjsysguievent.htm)

classes.name: BBjMouseEnterEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_MOUSE_ENTER event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/bbjmouseenterevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjExecuteScriptEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 19.10 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_EXECUTE_SCRIPT event. This reports the completion and result of a call to BBjHtmlView::executeAsyncScript or (in BBj 22.14 and higher) a call to BBjBuiManager::executeAsyncScript or (in BBj 24.00 and higher) a call to BBjWebComponent::executeAsyncScript. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjExecuteScriptEvent/BBjExecuteScriptEvent.htm)

methods.name: getScript
methods.docu: In BBj 19.10 and higher, this method returns the original script string passed to BBjHtmlView::executeAsyncScript or (in BBj 22.14 and higher) a call to BBjBuiManager::executeAsyncScript. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjExecuteScriptEvent/BBjExecuteScriptEvent_getScript.htm)

methods.name: getIndex
methods.docu: In BBj 22.14 and higher, this method returns the integer index returned from BBjHtmlView::executeAsyncScript or BBjBuiManager::executeAsyncScript. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjExecuteScriptEvent/BBjExecuteScriptEvent_getIndex.htm)

methods.name: getResult
methods.docu: In BBj 19.10 and higher, this method returns the result of BBjHtmlView::executeAsyncScript or (in BBj 22.14 and higher) BBjBuiManager::executeAsyncScript. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjExecuteScriptEvent/BBjExecuteScriptEvent_getResult.htm)

classes.name: BBjWindowLostFocusEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_WINDOW_LOST_FOCUS event. In BBj 12.0 and higher, returns a boolean value indicating whether a focus change is permanent or temporary. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjWindowLostFocusEvent/bbjwindowlostfocusevent.htm)

methods.name: isTemporary
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns a boolean value indicating whether a focus change is permanent or temporary.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjWindowLostFocusEvent/bbjwindowlostfocusevent_istemporary.htm)

classes.name: BBjListChangeEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_LIST_CHANGE event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjListChangeEvent/bbjlistchangeevent.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedIndices
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns a BBjVector containing the indices of the currently selected items in the BBjListBox, BBjListButton, BBjListEdit controls. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjListChangeEvent/bbjlistchangeevent_getselectedindices.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedIndex
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns the index of the currently selected item in the BBjListBox, BBjListButton, BBjListEdit controls. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjListChangeEvent/bbjlistchangeevent_getselectedindex.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedItem
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns the text of the currently selected item in a BBjListButton or BBjListEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjListChangeEvent/bbjlistchangeevent_getselecteditem.htm)

classes.name: BBjSpinEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_SPIN event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjSpinEvent/bbjspinevent.htm)

methods.name: getText
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and later, this method returns thenew value of the spinner as a string. . [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjSpinEvent/bbjspinevent_gettext.htm)

classes.name: BBjEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, BBjEvent is an abstract class that is the base class for all other events. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjEvent/bbjevent.htm)

methods.name: getEventString
methods.docu:
This method returns the event string in the same format as the legacy 
 event queue.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjEvent/BBjEvent_getEventString.htm)

methods.name: getEventName
methods.docu: In BBj 16.00 and higher, this method returns the event name (e.g. "BBjButtonPushEvent"). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjEvent/BBjEvent_getEventName.htm)

classes.name: BBjGridRightMouseUpEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_GRID_RIGHT_MOUSE_UP event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/bbjgridrightmouseupevent.htm)

classes.name: BBjCustomEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, a call to BBjAPI::postCustomEvent() or to BBjAPI::postPriorityCustomEvent adds this event to the BBj event queue. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/bbjcustomevent/bbjcustomevent.htm)

methods.name: getName
methods.docu: This method returns the name that was passed into the call to BBjAPI.postCustomEvent() or BBjAPI.postPriorityCustomEvent(). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/bbjcustomevent/bbjcustomevent_getname.htm)

methods.name: getObject
methods.docu: This method returns the object that was passed into the call to BBjAPI.postCustomEvent() or BBjAPI.postPriorityCustomEvent(). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/bbjcustomevent/bbjcustomevent_getobject.htm)

classes.name: BBjEditModifyEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_EDIT_MODIFY event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjEditModifyEvent/bbjeditmodifyevent.htm)

methods.name: getText
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns a snapshot of the text of the control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjEditModifyEvent/bbjeditmodifyevent_gettext.htm)

classes.name: BBjGridSpecialKeyEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_GRID_SPECIAL_KEY event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/BBjGridSpecialKeyEvent/bbjgridspecialkeyevent.htm)

methods.name: getKeyCode
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and later, this method retrieves the key code of the key which has been pressed.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/BBjGridSpecialKeyEvent/bbjgridspecialkeyevent_getkeycode.htm)

methods.name: getEditText
methods.docu: This method returns the current value of the editor at the time the event was generated.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/gridevents/BBjGridSpecialKeyEvent/bbjgridspecialkeyevent_getedittext.htm)

classes.name: BBjWindowMoveEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_WINDOW_MOVE event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjWindowMoveEvent/bbjwindowmoveevent.htm)

methods.name: getX
methods.docu: This method returns the new X coordinate of the BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjWindowMoveEvent/bbjwindowmoveevent_getx.htm)

methods.name: getY
methods.docu: This method returns the new Y coordinate of the BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjWindowMoveEvent/bbjwindowmoveevent_gety.htm)

classes.name: BBjTreeMouseDownEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_TREE_MOUSE_DOWN event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseDownEvent/bbjtreemousedownevent.htm)

methods.name: getTree
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this method returns the BBjTree associated with the BBjTreeMouseDownEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjTreeMouseDownEvent/BBjTreeMouseDownEvent_getTree.htm)

classes.name: BBjLinkFailedEvent
classes.docu: In BBj 22.03 and higher, this event is returned by BBjAPI().getLastEvent() when the program is executing callback code that the program has registered for the ON_LINK_FAILED event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjLinkFailedEvent/BBjLinkFailedEvent.htm)

methods.name: getUrl
methods.docu: In BBj 22.03 and higher, this method returns the URL that BBjWebManager::injectStyleUrl or BBjWebManager::injectLinkUrl failed to load. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjevents/BBjLinkFailedEvent/BBjLinkFailedEvent_getUrl.htm)
